mapper.update: update appointment set endTime = CURTIME(), meetingNotes=#{meetingNotes}, meetingFinished = 'Y' where appointmentId = #{appointmentId}
update appointment set startTime = CURTIME(), officialId = #{official_id}, meetingFinished = 'N' where appointmentId = #{app_id}
mapper.select: select gu.* from generaluser gu, appointment a where a.appointmentId = #{app_id} and a.userId = gu.userId
select ap.*,gu.firstname,gu.lastname from appointment ap, generaluser gu where ap.userId = gu.userId
